sentences.en: All charges of the tenancy, the number of requests are finished using the duration.
sentences.cn: 所有的充值数要求在租赁合同期内使用完.

sentences.en: Both parties have to sign a provisional tenancy agreement.
sentences.cn: 然后双方签订一份临时租约.

sentences.en: But after October nobody dared cancel a tenancy.
sentences.cn: 十月以后,无人敢退佃了.

sentences.en: He held a sole tenancy of a flat.
His tenancy of the office won't be long to run.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室的租期即将届满.

sentences.en: On occasion, I have been asked to provide a tenancy agreement.
sentences.cn: 偶尔我也会被要求提供一份住房租赁协议.

sentences.en: Tenancy - related matters, including security of tenure, are governed by the Landlord and Tenant ( Consolidation ) Ordinance.
sentences.cn: 租住权保障等与租赁有关的事宜, 由《业主与租客 ( 综合 ) 条例》规管.

sentences.en: Tenants should check their tenancy agreements closely.
sentences.cn: 租户应该认真核对租赁合同。

sentences.en: Term of Tenancy: Two months. From 15 th, Nov 2005 to 14 th, Jan 2006.
sentences.cn: 合同期限: 自2005年11月15日至2006年元月14日止, 总租期2个月.

sentences.en: The landlord gave notice of the termination of tenancy.
sentences.cn: 房东给了租期终止的通知.

sentences.en: The rent cannot be increased during the term of this tenancy Agreement.
sentences.cn: 在本合同有效期内,租金不予调整.

sentences.en: The tenancy may be extended upon terms and conditions agreed by both parties.
sentences.cn: 经双方协商同意,乙方可以新订租金继续租用该物业.

sentences.en: The tenancy of this large room is five years.
sentences.cn: 这个大房间的租期是五年.

sentences.en: Then population drifting, change of Land - relationship and tenancy forms are following.
sentences.cn: 伴随而来的是人口流移, 土地关系的变动,租佃形式的变化.

sentences.en: They had taken over the tenancy of the farm.

trans.tran_en: the period of time that someone rents a house, land etc
